#include<iostream>
int main(){
  int s1;
  std::cout << "Enter mark\n";
  std::cin >> s1 ;
  int s2;
  std::cout << "Enter mark\n";
  std::cin >> s2;
  std::cout << "Enter mark\n";
  int s3;
  std::cin >> s3 ;
  int sum = s1 + s2 + s3;
  // initialization
  std::cout << sum;
  return 0;
}
